column2: Provide API to support context run configuration in Kotlin multiplatform projects

column3: Pavel, the code looks mostly harmless, but Dmitry's comments are very good TODOs.
This changes were also reviewed in Upsource.
Merged to master, thank you for contribution!
Use MultipleRunLocationProvider to create multiple configurations
Provide API to avoid reusing tabs when running a group of configurations
Fix compound configuration not showing all the tabs sometimes
Fix "Run all" configuration now showing all the tabs sometimes
Implement notification to suggest using Run Dashboard
Suggest using Run Dashboard on 'Run all' action
Suggest using Run Dashboard on running compound run configuration
Use executionId instead of GroupRunId to avoid reusing tabs
